name: Briscola Jogatina HD
description:
The best version of Briscola is now available on your iPad! Specially designed to run smoothly on your device!

Play free wherever you are: there are thousands of people playing every day!

* * * * *

- Dynamic and intuitive interface
- Three game speeds: Slow, Medium and Fast
- Amazing graphichs: you can choose the color of the cards and table
- Save your matches against bots and comeback whenever you want
- Three deck types: Napoletane, Piacentine and Siciliane
- No sign-up needed
- Play wherever you are.
- The best version of Briscola for iPad

DOWNLOAD NOW
